# Spec: Add Dark Mode Toggle

## Goal

Allow users to switch between light and dark color themes in the application.

## Requirements

- [ ] Add a toggle switch in the settings page
- [ ] Persist theme preference in localStorage
- [ ] Apply theme using CSS variables
- [ ] Support system preference detection

## Constraints

- Must work with existing component library
- Should not increase bundle size by more than 5KB
- Must support all major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

## Acceptance Criteria

(No acceptance criteria defined)

## Out of Scope

- Custom color themes beyond light/dark
- Per-page theme settings
